title: League wont open!
body:
every time i go to sign into league it pulls up a message that says
 "we have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends. now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version."

Once i hit okay another message pops up and it says 

"there was a problem patching league of legends and try updating again after you restart the patcher."

 and after i hit restart is says the same to things again and again repeatedly

Send help please!

replies.body: Same thing here.... all the same steps... graphics are up to date, no unnecessary programs running
Restarting and updating windows 10 worked for me

Oh wow, that's one heck of a loop to get stuck in X_X....

Luckily I have another way for you to get that client patched again! Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and use it with the option **Force Repatch** turned on. Let me know how that goes, and we can troubleshoot a bit more if needed!
Tried closing everything out.  Hextech repair doesn't correct the issue, and reinstalling the client doesn't work either.  Anyone have any ideas?
Yeah I'm having the same exact issue and ive never had any problems ever before.  WHATS GOING ON!!!!
I'm having the exact same issue. HTR did nothing so I'm fixing it the hard way.
try closing all programs like logitech mouse or gamepad software or razer mouse software
